ygData.subject: Re: zoning
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I am not sure, but I would not do it anyway for two good reasons : 1) It makes me 1-2 minutes to zone - and the frustration this causes is almost
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mikael Laine [mailto:laine@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 7:30 AM
> To: EverQuest@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] zoning
>
> To those who likes zoning.
> This is like cheating to me. If you fight a monster or get
> attacked it would be much more fair if the monster followed you
> to the other zone. To zone as a "get a way" tactic is wimpy. I
> have to admit that I have done it but this is not the way I
> fight. This is like using safe spots to fight.
>
> That's many believes but I just wanted to give my 2 cents.
>

Well, I am not sure, but I would not do it anyway for two
good reasons :
1) It makes me 1-2 minutes to zone - and the frustration this
causes is almost unbearable, zoning back and forth would drive
me insane !
2) Ask any necromancer or magician why it is a stupid idea to
hunt on a zone boundary and zone to escape 8)
